title: if and when the built up areas of a cotton textile mill occupied for residential/residential cum com
clause_text: if and when the built up areas of a cotton textile mill occupied for residential/residential cum commercial purposes as on the 1st of January, 2000 developed or redeveloped, it shall be obligatory on the part of the land owner to provide to the occupants in lieu of each tenement covered by the development or redevelopment scheme, free of cost, an alternative tenement of the size of 405 sq ft carpet area; Provided that no such occupants shall be evicted till such time,
